update.name: "Multi Form Ajax Easy" Module AJAX feedback form
update.description: Module for Joomla-The module allows you to easily create any feedback forms. Wide functionality and easy configuration will allow you to receive messages immediately. Designed to increase sales of any sites. Sending an email and saving in article in the site category will allow you to follow all requests and allow you to create sections of reviews on the site.

infourl.title: Multi Form Ajax Easy - from ExplorerOffice.ru/en/
